mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PLOGGING(ID, LOCAL_CREATOR_ID, PLOGGING_TITLE, PLOGGING_CONTENT, PLOGGING_START_LOCATION, PLOGGING_END_LOCATION, PLOGGING_ESTIMATED_TIME, PLOGGING_MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT, PLOGGING_START_DATETIME, PLOGGING_STATUS, PLOGGING_APPLY_DATE, PLOGGING_REJECTED_REASON, PLOGGING_REGISTER_DATE, PLOGGING_UPDATED_DATE, PLOGGING_VIEWED_COUNT, PLOGGING_IMAGE_NAME, PLOGGING_IMAGE_UUID, PLOGGING_IMAGE_SIZE) VALUES(SEQ_PLOGGING.NEXTVAL, #{localCreatorId}, #{ploggingTitle}, #{ploggingContent}, #{ploggingStartLocation}, #{ploggingEndLocation}, #{ploggingEstimatedTime}, #{ploggingMaximumParticipant}, #{ploggingStartDateTime}, #{ploggingStatus} , SYSDATE, #{ploggingRejectedReason}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, (0) , #{ploggingImageName}, #{ploggingImageUuid}, #{ploggingImageSize})
mapper.select:
SELECT p.ID, LOCAL_CREATOR_ID,USER_NICKNAME , PLOGGING_TITLE, PLOGGING_CONTENT, PLOGGING_START_LOCATION, PLOGGING_END_LOCATION, PLOGGING_ESTIMATED_TIME, PLOGGING_MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT, PLOGGING_START_DATETIME, PLOGGING_STATUS, PLOGGING_APPLY_DATE, PLOGGING_REJECTED_REASON, PLOGGING_REGISTER_DATE, PLOGGING_UPDATED_DATE, PLOGGING_VIEWED_COUNT, PLOGGING_IMAGE_NAME, PLOGGING_IMAGE_UUID, PLOGGING_IMAGE_SIZE FROM TBL_USER u JOIN TBL_PLOGGING p ON u.ID = p.LOCAL_CREATOR_ID
WHERE PLOGGING_START_LOCATION LIKE '%'||#{location}||'%'
ORDER BY p.ID desc
SELECT COUNT(P.ID) FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_PLOGGING P ON U.ID = P.LOCAL_CREATOR_ID
SELECT p.ID, PLOGGING_IMAGE_NAME, PLOGGING_IMAGE_UUID, PLOGGING_IMAGE_SIZE FROM TBL_USER u JOIN TBL_PLOGGING p ON u.ID = p.ID
